tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Prisoner
programme.desc: Chicom agents capture Harm in Hong Kong; they vigorously question him in mainland China about official matters.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Ares
programme.desc: Someone kills a Naval officer on Okinawa, then his ship encounters major trouble during war games at sea.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Skeleton Crew
programme.desc: The body of a woman Naval officer, a friend, and classmate of Harm, is found ashore.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Trinity
programme.desc: Harm and his new partner, Marine Major Sara MacKenzie are drawn into a game of revenge when they're sent to Belfast, Ireland, to represent the legal interests of a Navy Lieutenant whose infant son has seemingly been abducted.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Secrets
programme.desc: Admiral Chegwidden, Mac and Bud Roberts are taken hostage in the Admiral's office by Pvt. Magida, a Marine who escaped from a nearby Federal prison.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Ghosts
programme.desc: Harm and Mac investigate an attempt on Admiral Chedwiggen's life and uncover the fact that all the members of his former SEAL team have died under mysterious circumstances.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Bat Poop Crazy
programme.desc: Before Halloween, Team Scorpion must infiltrate a deep, vast cave system in order to prevent a bat population from destroying the North America ecosystem.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: We're Gonna Need a Bigger Vote
programme.sub-title: We're Gonna Need a Bigger Vote
programme.desc: On Election Day, as democracy hangs in the balance, Team Scorpion is called on when someone tries to throw the U.S. presidential election into chaos.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Sly And The Family Stone
programme.desc: When Team Scorpion travels to Ireland for Megan's one-year memorial, Walter discovers that a nearby lake's natural disaster has created a poisonous cloud that could kill everyone in the village.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Mother Load
programme.desc: Paige's estranged mother calls on Team Scorpion when she accidentally uncovers a forgotten nuclear reactor on the verge of exploding.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: This Is The Pits
programme.desc: Walter must swim through the deadly La Brea Tar Pits when Team Scorpion helps a woman trapped in the tar before she runs out of oxygen.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Uprising
programme.desc: A riot breaks out at a women’s correctional institute while Andy, Juliet, Nick, and Gail are there to transfer prisoners. They end up in a lock-down situation that finds Andy and Juliet trapped with a woman desperate to prove her innocence.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Letting Go
programme.desc: When Nick’s estranged older brother emerges with new information on someone from their tragic past, Nick goes off the grid to track the man down. But Juliet is hot on his heels, and Nick is forced to let her into the secrets of his past.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: A Real Gentleman
programme.desc: When Traci is a no-show for her first raid, 15 Division fears the notorious gun dealer they’re after has kidnapped her. But when Andy realizes that the serial rapist we never caught is back, it’s all hands on deck to find Traci.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Home Run
programme.desc: After a community-outreach baseball game erupts in a drive-by shooting, Gail’s relationship with her brother is put to the test . Meanwhile, Swarek plans a getaway with Andy up to Oliver’s cabin, which goes off the rails in every possible way.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Best Man
programme.desc: Andy and Sam are shocked to learn that Oliver is the prime suspect in IA’s corruption investigation into 15 Division. They only have until end of day today to find Chris Klem – the missing explosives-dealer – and clear Oliver’s name.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Integrity Test
programme.desc: With Oliver still the prime suspect in the bombing of 15’s evidence room, Andy, Dov, Gail, and Nick undertake a risky – and potentially career-ending – plan to prove that Commissioner Alonso Santana is corrupt.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: An all but deserted manor house that boasts murder, death and intrigue among its history becomes the setting for one of the most intriguing investigation to date. The team are showered with object that appear to land in the same way.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and team are put to the test as activity seems to be all around them, something is following them but who or what. Could it be the spirit of a man they connect who died near the house over 100 years ago?(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Samlesbury Hall P1
programme.desc: With a history dating back to 1185, Salmesbury Hall is of the UK’s most historic buildings and said to be one of the most haunted. With ghost stories and sightings all over the building, Stuart investigates the ground floor.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Samlesbury Hall P2
programme.desc: Karl investigates the upper floors of this historic building dating back to 1185, and realises he is not alone.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Shrewsbury Prison
programme.desc: Abandoned prisons are always a daunting prospect and the Most Haunted team love them. This time Karl takes on HMP Shrewsbury alone and experiences some of the unhappy phantoms that lurk in the shadows.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Shrewsbury Prison
programme.desc: Yvette takes Karl, Stuart and Mary into the vast Shrewsbury Prison. A place riddled with paranormal activity of every kind.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Shrewsbury Prison Pt1
programme.desc: Yvette & Mary enter the vast expanse of the very haunted A-Wing on their own and soon start to regret their decision.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 16
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Hyde & Seek
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Cooperstown, New York, to investigate Hyde Hall.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Fort Henry
programme.desc: This week, TAPS is called in to investigate the Fort Henry, where it once served as a cornerstone for Canada's military defense and execution site.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Don't Feed the Apparition
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS revisits a familiar city, Alexandria, Louisiana, but this time, they're there to investigate the Alexandria Zoo.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Paranormal Pioneers
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Gloucester, Massachusetts to investigate Hammond Castle.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Dance of the Mayflies
programme.desc: Andromeda rescues dying people from a drift, but they soon turn into zombies being controlled by a hive-mind.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: In Heaven Now Are Three
programme.desc: The engine of creation is capable of rewriting the universe according to the owner's wishes. Dylan, Beka and Trance must obtain it before someone with dark plans gets it.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Things We Cannot Change
programme.desc: A black hole knocks out Dylan and sends him into an alternative reality with a wife and child.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Fair Unknown
programme.desc: The crew rescues one of the long-lost founders of the Commonwealth, but discovers she may be more trouble than she is worth.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Belly of the Beast
programme.desc: A mythological space monster tries to eat the Andromeda.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Knight, Death and the Devil
programme.sub-title: The Knight, Death and the Devil
programme.desc: Dylan attempts to liberate a fleet of captured ships, but the fleet isn't sure it wants to be liberated. Their AIs fear that new captains will enslave them.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.172
programme.desc: Man not father of child, sues mother for alleged loans. Jailed vegan seeks bailout due to prison food, friend demands repayment.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.119
programme.desc: Custody of a pit bull rescued from the pound is disputed by a man and his daughter; he says she abandoned the dog at his home/A woman sues her former friend for the cost of bailing her out of jail after she was arrested for false imprisonment.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.103
programme.desc: Threats to kill kittens, questionable remarks about a man’s sexuality and inappropriate, drunken toasts after the death of a child come into play when ex-friends fight over alleged vandalism.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.18
programme.desc: Teenagers steal car, vandalize junkyard; one pleads guilty, demands co-conspirator pay $15,000 fine/Woman sues ex for loan balance; he countersues for harassment/Woman seeks compensation for testifying against son's ex-girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.70
programme.desc: Landlord countersues female tenant, alleging she and her teenage daughter were problem renters who trashed the apartment. Woman sues former friend and co-worker for loan to prevent home foreclosure; friend denies promising repayment.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.201
programme.desc: A woman sues her ex-stepdaughter for unpaid loan to pay traffic fines, alleging deceit. A teen in a hit-and-run says she was scammed by the victim.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.225
programme.desc: A violent breakup leads ex-lovers to dispute damages from an assault, hotel fees, and destroyed property. Allegations of infidelity arise as a woman sues her ex-boyfriend for unpaid furniture, countered with claims of her ongoing relationship.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.205
programme.desc: Eighteen-year-old ex-roommates quarrel over a cat fight, the cost to replace a mattress, and vet bills.\t\t\t\r\nA woman sues her niece for a series of loans she says she made to pay for living expenses.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.223
programme.desc: A woman accuses her ex-boyfriend of charging over $10,000 on her emergency credit card while she studied abroad in Germany. A man admits to stabbing an air mattress due to spilled beer, leading to a lawsuit by his girlfriend's ex-boyfriend for damages.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.204
programme.desc: A man sues his ex-boyfriend for an unpaid loan he says he made for bail; he is countersued for alleged harassment.\t\t\t\r\nEx-lovers, who accuse each other of infidelity, fight over $3,000 in credit card bills.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.165
programme.desc: Man sues ex over alleged false restraining order; denies gun threat. Mother with concerns about son's spending keeps his money.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay tests the chefs' palates. Celebrity diners Eric McCormack and Robert Patrick stop by for dinner, bringing tensions to a boil.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Each team must present chef Ramsay with a dish made with king crab; each team gets to create their own menus for the dinner service.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Each chef must use 14 ingredients to create a dish to impress chef Ramsay; one chef is sent to the medic.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants visit the Borgata Hotel Casino & Spa, where one of them will receive a position as head chef; each contestant must create a signature dish.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay prepares dishes for the contestants to taste and re-create; a proposal is planned during the dinner service.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The final three chefs must prepare a meal for 100 people, including chefs from Los Angeles' finest restaurants.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canada’s largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Canlan Ice Sports Corp is the largest private owner of sports facilities in North America. CEO Joey St Aubin admits their prices are higher than local municipal rinks, but believes his company offers a premium service and better ice quality.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Tigner, the president of Kendall-Jackson Wine Estates, the second largest family owned wine company in the world, goes undercover posing as a grocery store employee who is pursuing his dream job in the wine industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The CEO of Canadian restaurant chain East Side Mario’s finds out what it’s really like for the Average Joe when he steps away from financial management to spend a week working undercover in his own kitchens.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Unpleasant Surprises
programme.desc: When Jennifer learns that the guys have nothing planned for Adam's last weekend as a bachelor, she plans a party weekend. Things don't go as planned, however, so Jeff, Russell, and Timmy must improvise.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Timmy Quits
programme.desc: Audrey has always had suspicions that Jeff's old college friend Heidi harbours romantic feelings for him, so Jeff invites Heidi over to prove that this was never the case.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: A Wee Problem
programme.desc: Jeff does his best to make a heavily pregnant Brenda laugh when he discovers that she has a `wee problem' due to her condition, but his antics cause her waters to break. Meanwhile, Adam annoys Audrey with his non-stop chatter during a spa visit.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: 100th
programme.desc: Brenda goes into labor on Jen and Adam's wedding day, but Jeff has reservations about being in the delivery room. Adam persuades Jen to make some alternative arrangements for their marriage ceremony.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Rules of Engagement: Pilot
programme.desc: Adam and Jennifer are a 20-something couple who have gotten engaged and moving in together after just seven months of dating. Meanwhile, their neighbors Jeff and Audrey who have been married for twelve years try to set a good example.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Birthday Deal
programme.desc: Though he's unhappy that Audrey spent more than usual for his birthday party, Jeff wants to stay on her good side to ensure he gets his yearly birthday deal. Though Jeff won't reveal the 'deal.'.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Young and the Restless
programme.desc: After Adam has too many restless nights sleeping in Jennifer’s small bed, he brings home the bed he shared with his ex-girlfriend which causes a fight and leads them tossing out all memories of past relationships.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Hard Day's Night
programme.desc: Jennifer tries to help Jeff’s sore neck with a massage until the situation between them becomes uncomfortable and upsets Audrey. Meanwhile, Russell brings Adam along to help him fight off a school yard bully so Russell can get close to the teacher.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Kids
programme.desc: Adam and Jennifer’s plans for a romantic weekend fall apart after they argue about their different feelings toward careers, finances, and kids. Meanwhile, Audrey is having second thoughts about why she and Jeff have waited so long to have children.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Game on
programme.desc: After Adam buys an expensive video-game console, Jennifer makes him promise to discuss major purchases first, but Russell interferes and makes Adam question the agreement.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jeff's Wooby
programme.desc: Audrey surprises Jeff by making quilt out of his old t-shirts but regrets her gift when he doesn't stop telling the stories that are behind the shirts.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Stormy Weather
programme.desc: Going after two fugitives in one day is tough enough without the facing Colorado's notoriously unpredictable weather. Today, it's the threat of severe thunderstorms, hail and area wide tornado warnings.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: One for the Money
programme.desc: It hurts Dog to see people who after years of walking the straight and narrow, suddenly lose their way. But today's case is a member of the law enforcement community who has recently gone astray, and that truly troubles the Dog.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Reality Check
programme.desc: Dog is back in Denver and in hot pursuit of a woman wanted for identity theft. The sad reality is that the identify which has been robbed is her own. She's traded in a bright future for a life on the wrong side of the law.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Piece of Cake
programme.desc: Being hunted by the Dog is a lousy way to celebrate your birthday but that's exactly the spot that Robert finds himself in today. He's missed his court date, quit his job, and vacated his last known address.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Prayers and Mace
programme.desc: Both brother Tim and fellow Honolulu bondsman James need Dog's help to track down their hard to find fugitives. The two cases on the docket today are challenging, especially the hunt for Gregory, a felon with a lengthy rap sheet.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: New Dog in Town
programme.desc: It's Beth's birthday and Dog knows just what she needs. He surprises Beth with Delilah, a puppy small enough to sit in the palm of her hand. Beth is so happy that she insists on taking the puppy with her on today's bounty.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Trick or Treat
programme.desc: It's Halloween, and before Dog and Beth can help the kids carve their pumpkins, they have some business to attend to. It involves knocking on doors and meeting the neighbors but instead of hunting for treats they're on the search for a fugitive.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Girl Trouble
programme.desc: Dog and the team have girl trouble in this case. Krystal jumped bail and seems to have vanished into the high plains of Colorado. To make matters worse, she's running with her lover (and bond co-signer) Carrie. But Thelma and Louise they ain't.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Seeing the Light
programme.desc: Today Leland and Dog make a quick visit to the police supply store to get some new gadgets for the team but they can't linger because they've also got a fugitive to catch. Their target is reputed to have an explosive temper.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Till Duck Do Us Part
programme.desc: Everyone comes together to plan a surprise wedding for Phil and Kay, setting up a special ceremony on their land, which the whole family attends. Si distracts Phil and Kay by taking them on a "trip down memory lane".(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: So You Think You Can Date?
programme.sub-title: So You Think You Can Date?
programme.desc: After discovering that Martin has to miss a Friday night poker game for a date, the guys (as well as their wives) take turns figuring out the best way to coach him for romance. When babysitting for Jep and Jessica turns into a rocky road.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hot Tub Grime Machine
programme.desc: The guys realize that Godwin has never really asked them for a favor, even though they are all always helping each other out. Godwin asks them to help him get a hot tub, so they set out to help him pick one up.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A-Jase-ent Living
programme.desc: Due to construction at Jase and Missy's house, Willie and Korie invite Jase and the kids to live with them while Missy is out of town visiting friends. Then, what begins in the duck call room as a series of "Gentlemen's Bets".(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Termite Be a Problem
programme.desc: Because of a termite problem at Duck Commander, the guys are forced to find a different location to work from - Godwin's House. But while at Godwin's house, Godwin gets a taxidermied gift from a past relative.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: John Luke After Dentist
programme.desc: John Luke and Sadie are getting some dental work done, complete with sedation, and it's up to Willie and Korie to take care of them through the process - including getting them back home safely.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Scoot Along Si
programme.desc: Si shows up to work on a mobility scooter, claiming to have an invisible injury from a fender bender with Willie. After losing her beloved turtle "Mr. T", Ms. Kay enlists Phil on a mission to find a new pet turtle.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Jerky Boys
programme.desc: A decision to try and make some duck jerky leads the boys to Godwin's garage and a minibike race. Phil and Kay have made Willie the executor of their will, and Phil wants to show Willie what he and his brothers will inherit when he and Kay pass away.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Going Si-ral
programme.desc: Si discovers Youtube, and, after watching a series of instructional videos, decides he can make something better. John Luke totals Willie's truck, and Willie realizes he may be raising the two worst drivers in all of Louisiana.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack-O-Lantern
programme.desc: The Robertsons host a Halloween event at Duck Commander, where they all come together to transform the warehouse into a "scarehouse." Everyone dresses up and Willie desperately tries to be the scariest, but none of the kids are afraid of him.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: O Little Town of West Monroe
programme.sub-title: O Little Town of West Monroe
programme.desc: The Robertsons perform a live nativity for their Church for Christmas, so the wives organize rehearsals to ensure that they pull off a great event. However, rehearsals get off to a bumpy start as the guys can't stop sharing their opinions.(n)

programme.title: Magical Adventures in the Forbidden City
programme.desc: In another world Abigail lives in a city whose borders were closed years ago because of a disease. She takes us on a magical adventure, rising against the forces in command and shows how being brave and following your heart can show anything is possible.(n)

programme.title: Timeline: Timeline
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.(n)

programme.title: Solar Attack
programme.desc: When the sun's increasing expulsions of plasma threaten to ignite methane in our atmosphere, international tensions rise while scientists race for a solution to avoid natural disaster.(n)

programme.title: The Librarian: Quest for the Spear
programme.desc: As a means of finding the legendary book known as the Key of Solomon, Flynn pairs with a brainy archaeologist to first acquire the map legend. Unfortunately, they must elude the sinister General Samir and the ulterior plans of Flynn's uncle.(n)

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: While helping a handful of plane crash survivors cope with their grief, young psychologist Claire Summers (2008 Best Actress, Oscar® nominee Anne Hathaway, Rachel Getting Married) begins to uncover conflicting accounts of the accident. rated -PG-13.(n)

programme.title: The Arrival
programme.desc: Radio astronomer Zane Zaminsky believes he has picked up a cosmic noise that signals extraterrestrial intelligence. His desperate search for answers leads him to discover that aliens are already on Earth and in the process of preparing to take it over.(n)

programme.title: The Librarian: Quest for the Spear
programme.desc: As a means of finding the legendary book known as the Key of Solomon, Flynn pairs with a brainy archaeologist to first acquire the map legend. Unfortunately, they must elude the sinister General Samir and the ulterior plans of Flynn's uncle.(n)

programme.title: Guardians of the Tomb
programme.desc: In a quest to find a lost colleague, a team of scientists find themselves deep underground in an ancient labyrinth, while trying to unearth a secret that has been buried for centuries.(n)

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: From director of action blockbuster Lethal Weapon, Richard Donner. Personal demons put cop Jack (Bruce Willis - Die Hard) at rock bottom but he wasn’t about to let a witness be murdered on his watch.(n)

programme.title: Santa Fake
programme.desc: A young man from Ireland has moved to the United States and finds himself working for a mob boss. When asked to deliver two mysterious briefcases, he ends up in Santa Fe working as a shopping mall Santa and on the run from the police and the mobsters.(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Gift
programme.desc: Inspired by a true story. Ten-year-old Wesley puts together a "Secret Santa" gift for a needy child and when ten-year-old Megan opens the package, she discovers an item that will have a huge impact on her life to come.(n)

programme.title: This is Our Christmas
programme.desc: When a spoiled Beverly Hills teenager needs to be taught a lesson she is sent to the local ski-town, by her guardian angel mother to help save her aunt's failing bakery and learn the importance of helping others.(n)

programme.title: Chasing Christmas
programme.desc: A bitter and burned-out Ghost of Christmas Past decides to go AWOL.(n)

programme.title: Watching Over You
programme.desc: Single mom Sarah moves into the suburbs and starts dating a firefighter, only to find herself the target of an obsessive neighborhood watchman who aims to prove he’s the best man to protect her… even if he has to create the danger himself.(n)

programme.title: Grandma Dearest
programme.desc: A psychotic woman goes to murderous lengths to protect her relationship with her new grandchildren.(n)

programme.title: Hatchet Hour
programme.desc: An ambitious lawyer kills her gardener by mistake, fearing her chances with the law and the impact this will have on her career at a prestigious firm, she turns to her best friend to help her get rid of the body.(n)

programme.title: Living in Fear
programme.desc: A newly married bride travels to her husband's hometown for the reading of his father's will. When she discovers that the townspeople suspect her husband of a murder committed twenty years ago, she has her doubts about the man she's committed her life to.(n)

programme.title: The Cat's Meow
programme.desc: Movie producer Thomas Ince (Cary Elwes) dies after yachting with William Randolph Hearst (Edward Herrmann), Charlie Chaplin and Marion Davies (Kirsten Dunst).(n)

programme.title: Betrayed
programme.desc: A college student suspects her new stepfather may be having an affair. Her suspicions seem to be confirmed when she sees him with another woman; a woman who is later found dead. She begins to wonder exactly who her mother married.(n)

programme.title: Good Morning, Killer
programme.desc: An FBI agent (Catherine Bell) tracks a kidnapper while developing a rapport with his latest victim.(n)

programme.title: The Cat's Meow
programme.desc: Movie producer Thomas Ince (Cary Elwes) dies after yachting with William Randolph Hearst (Edward Herrmann), Charlie Chaplin and Marion Davies (Kirsten Dunst).(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The $275,000 Sack of Flour
programme.desc: Reuel Gridley pays off a bet by donating a bag of flour to a fund for the Civil War wounded.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Suzie
programme.desc: A husband and wife catch trouble when they allow an Apache chief's granddaughter to stay with them.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Fort Bowie: Urgent
programme.desc: Officials rush to send word to a bride that an escaped criminal wants to stop her wedding.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Seven condemned murderers escape and take over the town of North Fork.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Mark finds gold on their property, a fast-talking salesman who tried to sell Lucas a new lightning rod offers instead to buy the ranch's mineral rights.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas tracks an escaped prisoner to a town that turns out to be run by the gunman's brother who is notorious for shooting people in the back.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When an outlaw leader lures Marshall Torrance out of town, Only Lucas can stop him from lynching a local man who killed one of the members of his gang.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A former army captain comes to North Fork to kill the man who shot down his son in a gunfight - Lucas McCain.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark and his friend become trapped in an old mine.(n)

programme.title: Switched
programme.desc: Tired of being bullied, Cassandra Evans prays that her nemesis, Katie Sharp, the queen bee of social media, would know what it's like to walk a day in her shoes. Her prayer is answered in an unexpected way when they get "Switched.(n)

programme.title: Storm Boy
programme.desc: When Michael Kingley, a successful retired businessman starts to see images from his past that he can't explain, he's forced to remember his childhood and how, as a boy, he rescued and raised an extraordinary orphaned pelican, Mr Percival.(n)

programme.title: Heaven Must Wait
programme.desc: An American inherits an old village church in England, where treasure is buried. Greedy Mr. Slee scents his opportunity to snatch the treasure. Diggity, a little cherub trying to earn his wings, helps uncover the treasure for the benefit of the village.(n)

programme.title: Mark & Russell's Wild Ride
programme.desc: Mark is excited when the most popular girl in his class asks HIM to drive her to a party, except he doesn't have a license. With his popularity on the line and his best friend Russell in tow, Mark hits the road on a cross-town adventure.(n)

programme.title: Bottle Shock
programme.desc: The story of the early days of California wine making featuring the now infamous, blind Paris wine tasting of 1976 that has come to be known as "Judgment of Paris". Feat: Chris Pine, Alan Rickman & Bill Pullman.(n)

programme.title: Battling for Baby
programme.desc: After Katherine (Courteney Cox) decides to return to work to help pay the bills, her baby's grandmothers (Debbie Reynolds & Suzanne Pleshette) argue over who will take care of her child.(n)

programme.title: Funny Money
programme.desc: When Henry Perkins accidentally trades his briefcase with a man, he finds five million dollars inside. However, the cash draws in Mr. Big, who wants to reclaim his money.(n)

programme.title: Sapphire
programme.desc: In 1950s London racial hostility to Commonwealth immigrants is openly paraded. Scotland Yard detectives probe the racially motivated murder of a young woman.(n)

programme.title: Fright
programme.desc: A baby sitter is terrorised by a homicidal maniac who's escaped from a mental institution to kill his ex-wife.(n)

programme.title: Demons of the Mind
programme.desc: A history of inherited insanity spells trouble for a 19th-century nobleman suspected of a series of grisly murders.(n)

programme.title: Straight on Till Morning
programme.desc: A timid, withdrawn woman from Liverpool moves to London and finally meets a man who she believes to be the love of her life, but unbeknownst to her, that man is a vicious serial killer.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Transformation
programme.desc: Sydney, Nigel and Derek Lloyd go to the Peruvian jungle to look for the Paracelsus scrolls which contain the formula for turning lead into gold.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: On the premiere episode of "Quantum Leap," Sam Beckett wakes up in 1956, disoriented, suffering from amnesia, but he has the awful realization that he does not belong there... Part 1 of 2.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam takes part in the Quantum Leap experiment which lands him in 1956 as a test pilot. With the help of his holographic "Observer", Sam learns that his fate is to "quantum leap" through time with the hope of returning to his own present. Part 2 of 2.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the persona of a womanizing college professor in 1972, encounters his lost love (Teri Hatcher) and attempts to reshape the past. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.sub-title: The Right Hand of God - October 24, 1974
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) lands in 1974 as a young boxer caught between fight-fixing gangsters and hopeful nuns who now own his contract. With Dean Stockwell. Guest stars Guy Stockwell and Teri Copley.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: When Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes an attractive female secretary in 1961, he must deal with rampant sexism and his employer's lecherous advances. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Peer Pressure (REDUX)
programme.desc: Dante brings a captive fugitive aboard, along with her teenage son, Ajit. Percy and Ajit's immediate attraction sparks a conflict which endangers everyone.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Frozen (REDUX)
programme.desc: Dante must decide whether to save a scientist and his son from the clutches of the Raiders, or use them as a bargaining chip to find his own child.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Past Lives (REDUX)
programme.desc: Dante's crew capture an alleged murderer, wanted by The Orchard, who turns out to be Luc's ex-husband. Luc is left with only terrible options.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Family Values (REDUX)
programme.desc: When Dante and Luc capture a Raider, Dante is caught between his sense of justice and his desire for vengeance.(n)

programme.title: Flash Gordon Conquers the Universe: The Palace of Terror
programme.desc: Flash Gordon, Dale Arden and Dr. Zarkov return to the planet Mongo for an antidote to the Purple Death, which wreaking destruction on Earth. However, Ming the Merciless has other plans for them.(n)

programme.title: Flash Gordon Conquers the Universe: Flaming Death
programme.desc: Flash Gordon, Dale Arden and Dr. Zarkov return to the planet Mongo for an antidote to the Purple Death, which wreaking destruction on Earth. However, Ming the Merciless has other plans for them.(n)

programme.title: Flash Gordon Conquers the Universe: The Land of the Dead
programme.desc: Flash Gordon, Dale Arden and Dr. Zarkov return to the planet Mongo for an antidote to the Purple Death, which wreaking destruction on Earth. However, Ming the Merciless has other plans for them.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Home on the Gun Range
programme.desc: Barely making it to an auction in Corona, CA, Allen and Ton buy an overstuffed unit and find an antique crossbow, a rare 10-gauge Winchester shotgun and a 1940s Kiss-o-Meter.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Cold Hard Cash
programme.desc: Ton and Allen go North to Alaska and get a cold reception from the local auctioneer. They find two enormous seaplane pontoons and a pair of Smith & Wesson revolvers, including the most powerful production handgun in the world!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Money Makin' Monster Machines
programme.desc: The Auction Hunters team goes on the attack & ends up on a collision course with a hardened veteran auction buyer. They uncover a collection of speedy off-road vehicles and some hardcore heavy metal from the turn-of the-century!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Viva la Vegas
programme.desc: 1974 death-defying Zig Zag magic sword box, an ultra-rare 1910 poster of the infamous magician Chung Ling Soo, an 1800s naval cane sword and century-old Metlach German beer steins.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gold 'n' Gloves
programme.desc: The Auction Hunters team goes toe-to-toe with Ton's evil twin! They find a medieval catapult designed for storming castles and Ton uncovers a hidden collection of gold bars worth thousands of dollars!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Rodeo Ton
programme.desc: 1970s El Toro mechanical bull used to train bull riders; silver WWII era banjo; a collection of 1800s handcrafted hunting duck decoys.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Everything's Bigger in Texas
programme.desc: Winchester 1886 rifle invented to kill buffalo; collection of 1950s electric Slot Cars.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Reel Money
programme.desc: 1970's-era Fighting Chair used for big-game fishing; military MILES "laser tag" training system.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Mr. Haff Goes to Washington
programme.desc: Ton and Allen invade the Nation's capital, but meet strong resistance from local bidders. The guys uncover a Civil War era black powder revolver and a stash of South African gold coins!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Chi-Town Showdown
programme.desc: Metal Victorian-era burial casket; 1870s glass fire extinguisher grenades; a mechanical 1896 handcrafted Chicago fire station alarm box.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Animal Instincts
programme.desc: The first pump action shotgun - a Winchester Model 1897; a hunter's collection of prize big game, full-body taxidermy.(n)
